website_summaries.verdict: Simple probiotic drops made with quality ingredients for kids and infants of all ages.
pros: Parents love the ease of administering liquid probiotic drops since they can be added to any unheated drink
These drops are safe for children with most allergies
Kids enjoy the grape flavor, and parents notice positive changes in gut and skin health quickly
cons: User have noted that measurement lines on the dropper would be convenient

website_summaries.verdict: A fast, easy and precise way to give probiotics to kids reluctant to take a chewable or standard pill.
pros: Very easy to administer to infants, with liquid allowing for tailored doses to children of different ages and weights
cons: Results are mixed when using to treat stomach issues or colic
Taste of the liquid is too strong for some
Babies may spit up right after receiving a dose

customer_reviews.title: Had to edit to give poor review-diluted now
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the change of this product. It is very diluted now from when we began to use it. We will not be buying more unless contacted that will change product quality back to original. Now have to use substantially more drops to get same effect and price keeps going up.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: He went from miserable all the time to happy and content
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this product deserves one. Absolutely incredible product. It transformed my 5 week old son in 3 days... He went from miserable all the time to happy and content. We were able to stop reflux medications as well. All colic symptoms were gone. I recommend it to everyone I can who is having same issues with their babies.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Made child very upset
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes based off other comments, however these really hurt our little one. She cried for 2 hours after taking these. We consulted with a pediatrician at the top children’s hospital in the US who recommended a different probiotic which worked wonders within a day from stopping these. These maybe better for older kids not infants.
customer_reviews.author: maria dixon

customer_reviews.title: Not for my infant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a supposedly high quality probiotic that is good for infants. My little guy has reflux and terrible gas and our pediatrician recommended trying a probiotic. We have tried this off and on over the last 2 months and each time it causes him writhing pain and difficulties pooping. We have tried multiple times, only 1-2 drops each time. Poor guy becomes miserable for about 12 hours. Something more baby specific worked much better for us.
customer_reviews.author: kaufdn

customer_reviews.title: strange.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not exactly sure about this stuff. I have given my baby a couple different kinds of probiotics but never seen him behave like he did on this stuff. he was always grumpy and his diapers looked runny but took him off this stuff and 3 days later back to what he was before.
customer_reviews.author: Janina Toews

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for colic babies
customer_reviews.text: After a week of using this, my 7 week old has stopped her random colic episodes! She's sleeping sounder - still wakes every 2-3 hours. But huge improvement since she used to be up most of the night screaming and fussy in the day. Her BMs are more consistent, too! Couldn't be happier. As an aside, I saw zero effect from Gerbercolic probiotic drops.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 month old after he had an ear infection and had to be put on antibiotics. I noticed that it helped his stomach stabilize and have normal bowel movements. The reason for 4 star is because of the taste. I tried it on my tongue and it is not great tasting but my little one did not mind it too much. I believe that this product does what it is suppose to do. Will buy again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Pasha

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics helped our 4 month old who struggles with constipation and gas. Her stomach is doing well with this in combination with prunes pears, plums and sweet potato. One difficulty with this product is the taste. Her dose is only one drop and she tends to spit it out. Sometimes we have to give her a few drops to know for sure she is getting them! I really like all the information this company provides you with.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the product and delete extra emails.
customer_reviews.text: My wife chose this for our twin daughters and it works very well. Their poop has changed from green to yellow(they eat formula, and yellow is an indicator or breastmilk). My wife is happy with it, and I was fine with it too, but I got my third and final email from Humerian that they would like a review. Please don't act desperate, especially when you have a great product. One email and let it go, or try a promotion to get people to share on social media.
customer_reviews.author: James Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Moldy dropper?
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to trying this product for my 6 month old baby. Unfortunately, the dropper looks moldy? I’m scared to have her try it! :(
customer_reviews.author: GAA_MIL

customer_reviews.title: It works! No more miserable baby! All in one probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Easy to measure and store! Has all the strains for babies! Best one yet and I’ve tried a lot of brands for colic, tummy troubles and acid reflux! Although all have worked somewhat they didn’t have all the types needed for everything, this has it all. Almost Immediate relief of gas and movements.. now twice a day movements instead of every 1-2days and painful at that. haven’t had acid reflux or miserable wake ups or miserable feedings. If you have screaming baby for no reason try this! Probiotics can’t hurt! Just start doses slowly though.. start with 2-3 drops then move up from there
customer_reviews.author: MelHB

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this probiotic! My daughter was suffering from the after effects of a GI infection and after two weeks still had problems processing lactose (I.e. had frequent green poop). After a single dose of this probiotic her poop was normal colored again. After two doses her diarrhea was gone! She was EBF at the time but the impact of this probiotic was undeniable.
customer_reviews.author: Leela Rao

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: I both this product because it supposed to contain many beneficial strains of bacteria. It did not make any difference in my kids health. After the second bottle I tested it as recommended by my friend microbiologist. I put a recommended dose in one once of room temperature milk to see how fast it will ferment. Nothing happen during the 24h, meaning that the bacteria in this product was not active. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Malgorzata

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic, like that it's liquid and not powder
customer_reviews.text: Really like this probiotic for both my baby and toddler. Easy to give straight or mixed in something. The company is also great to work with, and answered my questions quickly. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because the bottle says a different dosage then they email you after you purchase. Bottle should be updated with proper recommendations. Also, just make sure not to put the dropper too far into the baby's mouth- I did that the first time and he quickly drank the entire dropper full before I had time to just drop a couple drops in his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: I’m pleased so far.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today. I ordered it for my 2 year old who experiences constipation and eczema. I will update my review after he has used it for awhile. I’m currently rating 4 stars due to quick delivery and it was packaged safely. My son had his first dose and he loved it. We have tried dozens of probiotics and I’m excited to try this one due to the reviews. In the past, we used either powder or chewables and this is sooo much more convenient. It doesn’t have to be refrigerated and my son took the drops directly and thought they were yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner28

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: My baby had to have a week of pretty heavy duty antibiotics, which really messed up his digestive system. This probiotic helped make him more regular. The dropper included with this probiotic is much easier to use than some of the other probiotics on the market, and my baby seems to like the taste. Although it is expensive, it is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Abigailp

customer_reviews.title: I love em
customer_reviews.text: I love them, kids hate them lol. I quickly juse use the dropper to drop the drops directly on their tongue and done in a minute. So yeah, the kids don't think they are the best tasting thing in the world, but they still get their probiotics in fairly easily and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kyliandonny

customer_reviews.title: Product caused major digestive issues for baby
customer_reviews.text: My one month old had yeast overgrowth and I decided to try this product. Each time I gave it to her it caused her to scream for hours. After a few weeks, it started causing diapers that were completely mucous with blood. I stopped the product and waited two weeks before starting again. Same result. Screaming, explosive diapers, followed by mucous with blood streaks. I have two stars because it did clear up her yeast, but was not worth the digestive distress.
customer_reviews.author: Angelmommy

customer_reviews.title: Healthy gut = healthy child!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves this stuff. Not sure how to say this politely, but ever since she started using this I can tell a huge difference when she uses the bathroom. And maybe I’m imagining this but I think her mood is better overall when taking this consistently. I recommend these probiotics to all of my mom friends who want to improve the gut health of their little ones! My husband and I also use the adult version. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: She loved the taste and I had no problems getting her ...
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to my daughter during a round of antibiotics to help with digestive issues and to help prevent a yeast diaper rash (which she had gotten with her last round of antibiotics). She loved the taste and I had no problems getting her to take the drops. She also didnt have any diarrhea or a yeast diaper rash during her round of antibiotics - it was a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Caufield

customer_reviews.title: Treated newborn thrush
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to treat my newborn daughter’s thrush. I was on 3 courses of antibiotics in the last month of pregnancy, along with antibiotics given during c section. We noticed thrush on her tongue at a few weeks old. She has been taking these drops for 2 weeks and her tongue is no longer white, she acts happier when eating, and the dry skin (possible yeast) on her forehead and eyebrows is clearing up too. As a newborn, we give her 6 drops a day in a bottle of milk. Taste of the drops doesn’t seem to be noticeable to her.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Rash
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this gave our son full body rashes and some irritable bowels. I’m thinking it was the flavoring, but not sure. Based off of our experience we would definitely not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this product for over half a year now. Around 2 months old we noticed that my son had reflux. He wasn't losing weight, but I did had to change his outfit multiple times a day. I changed my diet, because (I breast feed) that didn't help. I gave him some rice cereal and he kept spitting up. Then I heard about probotix and decided to give that a try. With in a week or two I noticed a differance. He, over time stopped spitting up entirely. He eat anything now, from cheese to the occasional bit of dog food and doesn't spit up. And he loves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about trying probiotics on an infant and didn’t try for the longest time. I was a strong believer that infants should not be given anything other than breastmilk or infant formula. Well I regret why I didn’t give this a try sooner. My son had intolerance to milk during early infancy which caused him to have very lose and mucusy stools. It went on for months and when GI strongly suggested a probiotic I gave this a try. Within 3 days we saw huge difference and no mucus anymore at all. I swear by this stuff now.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh

customer_reviews.title: Works i rebuy
customer_reviews.text: Of course I’d wish bottle was large but stuff works, it even works on baby mouth thrust, doc said to wipe with gauze and kept doing that and kept returning, and dropped a drop on tongue in mouth like for 2 days and all gone, when kids get sick i give to them too
customer_reviews.author: Niknac

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working so far
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff.my boys have psoriasis set off by environment and autoimmune issues as a result of being born 3 months early. I noticed that this seems to help. One of them has no issue after a short time, the other seems to have less skin irratition on his feet which is huge. They love the flavor and get stoked when I say time for your probiotics ☺️
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie I.

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old has been teething straight for months now. My midwife recommended probiotics just to help his body with the stress of teething.he has been mostly very happy and healthy and he is so used to them he stops playing and opens his mouth 😆2 drops three times a day . Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsybarrett

customer_reviews.title: Huge help for 2 month old
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving this to my 2 month old son for only 3 days. He has major gas issues since I had to hard switch from breastfeeding to formula. Even with using special gas relief formula he had issues. He's seems to be even better with his gas/stomach issues even this short time!
customer_reviews.author: KiKi

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Baby was super fussy for no real reason and someone recommended probiotic drops. I give him one drop a day, starting at around 1 month old or so. He loves it and it does seem to help calm him down. Make sure you don't give it to babies close to feeding time because they could easily spit it all up.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Kids
customer_reviews.text: I give these probiotics to both of my boys, a preschooler and a toddler. My toddler was on a lot of antibiotics when he was younger and so I feel good about giving him probiotics in the hope that it will help build up the good bacteria again. For both boys I feel that the probiotics give them an extra line of defense against all of the usual preschool and daycare germs.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: It may be too strong for infants
customer_reviews.text: I used the regular strength for a month but thought I'd try this one for my 3 month old, he has awful gas. He has been using it for a few days but is vomiting when he normally have the occasional spit up. I stopped using it to see if it's the probiotics. So far today, he did not spit up. I will try one more day before going back to the regular strength.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: We have a happy baby now
customer_reviews.text: Have been dealing with fussiness and gut issues since birth with my 9 week old. Started this probiotic and one week later, her stools are no longer watery and her general disposition much more pleasant. I attribute to this product and cell salts which we also started. I have since dc’d the cell salts but will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: OfficeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great for colic and to keep an older baby regular!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these probiotics on my babe since he was a newborn, first for colic and gas pains, and now to keep him regular as he gets used to more and more solids and less purées. He’s 13mo now and i can count on a bowel movement within a couple hours after administering the drops where he hadn’t pooped in days!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These drops worked wonderfully for our daughter. With the introduction of soild food she became constipated. Just a couple days on these drops and she was back to regular and doing great. I’ve noticed if we forget the drops we can tell a difference, so it wasn’t just a coincidence. I also love that these are drops not powder, much easier to give. She loves the taste and opens her mouth As soon as I open the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Good Children Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: This Product is very good for your infant or for young children. Must give it time to work depending on your situation it may take a few weeks to a month. But it definitely works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic for my son!
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old son has had tummy issues, constipation issues, and sleep problems since birth. He has never pooped consistency and rarely sleeps through the night. Now, he is pooping once a day and sleeping through the night on a more regular basis. I have been looking for a liquid probiotic for him for so long and this one is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: TeamTI

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Help A Little
customer_reviews.text: My daughter cries if I give it to her on an empty stomach. When I give it on a full stomach, it seems to help her bowel movements and reflux
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: A little expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Our pediatrician suggested a probiotic for our baby because she has acid reflux, seems like it helps. Easy to use, baby didn't care for it at 1st but now likes the taste. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: daypache

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son has no problem taking this in his bottle. It keeps him regular and everything moving. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: It really is great!
customer_reviews.text: Been giving to my 4month old and seen great improvement in her comfort. She was in the Nicu, given lots of antibiotics and we want to give her some healthy ones back. She has been having troubles with reflux and happy to say she is Going off Zantac too!
customer_reviews.author: JuliAnna Kockelman

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These probiotics worked so well. My daughter has an allergy to cow milk/sugar and was constipated a lot. I bought this in hope to alleviate her constipation and help her intestines per her pediatricians request. I researched different companies and found these probiotics that were on the expense side but so worth the money. My baby is having a bowel movement 1-3 times a day and noticed she is a lot happier.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Saver
customer_reviews.text: Pediatrician recommended these and they worked like a charm. We no longer use them but for the first 6 months, these were used everyday and we saw a difference within the first 48 hours. This product helped save us some sleep
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Too sour!
customer_reviews.text: I like the stuff for kids that have a mild sweet taste and can be given in a syringe, this is a bit of a pain being in such a tiny glass bottle and me counting drops, my son spit the stuff right out, it’s way too sour, what kid would actually eat it?
customer_reviews.author: marina solodukho

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my pediatrician for my kids. I didn’t see a bug difference, but they needed probiotics so hey they got it!
customer_reviews.author: I bought here or elsewhere

customer_reviews.title: Works for thrush!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old baby had thrush on her tongue and this really helped start clearing it up when I noticed the medication (nystatin) the pediatrician prescribed wasn't really working. I don't think it taste great as no grape flavor of anything does because she makes a face every time I drop it on her tongue and tries to spit it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: We started giving this to our 2 month old daily after she started fussing in the evening and waking up at night with gas. We have been using it for a month. She seems to be less fussy with less gas. We also changed bottles, which may also be helping, but I believe the probiotics have definitely contributed to the improvement. I put the drops in her mouth and she doesn’t mind the taste at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bohl

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are pricey but very easy to dispense and my 3 year old will take them straight on the tongue and actually will ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have twins with reflux and these probiotics work wonders and have calmed their reflux and I am one happy momma! I tasted this and it tastes like the purple flinestones vitamin in case you were wondering hahah
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Convinced this product helps some with immunity for my 2.5 year old and 7 month old who are both in daycare (esp during flu season). 2.5 year old loves the taste, the baby - not so much. Gerber Soothe and other products we've tried have been pretty ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Did not get to try the product yet 😔
customer_reviews.text: The bottle got spilled the day it arrived, so we did not get to try it, I was plank on using it on my 2 year old daughter with speech apraxia, and my almost 2 year old daughter with severe dermatitis and skin disorders, I really liked the strains in your product, hoping to try again when we can afford! Ty and have a blessed night
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Better
customer_reviews.text: Edit-This company sent me a replacement immediately and sent me some more of their products to try. Great customer service. Im excited to try them out. Thank you! Moldy dropper with hardened formula inside. I am not giving this to my child! Ick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, contains artificial grape flavoring.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product overall. At 12 weeks my EBF baby has acquired bowel regularity. It takes a bit of use for this to happen, approx 2-4 weeks. I am happy that he has a BM everyday or every other day at this point, with less bowel sounds. I do not like that this product is flavored. This gave me pause and would rather not put a flavoring into my days old baby. Will not buy this product again because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Chigal

customer_reviews.title: My son was having some acid reflux issues and I ...
customer_reviews.text: My son was having some acid reflux issues and I wanted to try Probonix drops and see if it would work on him. After taking for 2 weeks no changes, but coming to 4 weeks my son has not been complaining of any symptoms. So since the drops have not caused any adverse effects and his symptoms have improved I will continue using Probonix.
customer_reviews.author: Jose EL

customer_reviews.title: I started giving this to my son at age 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this to my son at age 6 months. I learned about it while reading Mama Natural's website. The first few times it was a little too tart for my son, I think... but then after that I'd show him the bottle and he'd run to me to get his daily dose. :) He likes it. Kid approved. I also tried to make yogurt with it, but wasn't successful.
customer_reviews.author: America YC

customer_reviews.text: Can’t say whether or not it worked for my 11 month old who was/is having digestive issues. She doesn’t mind taking it, so that was a bonus. Price was waaaaaay expensive. Might just give her sauerkraut and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: johnny b

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this from the time my 15 month old LO was born, and it has worked very well. However, the last batch with an exp of 8/18 is not good. Tonight when I opened it, it was fermented like vinegar and burst open when I turned the lid. Quality product, but make sure of your exp dates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best probiotic for babies
customer_reviews.text: This is the best probiotic for babies. My baby had a terrible tummy and these saved him. He has been on them for 5 months and he can handle all the second foods no problem! Keeps him regular without gas or stomach pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: To help with gas
customer_reviews.text: I got this because the doctor said it would help with gas. It seems to help. Baby does not mind it. It is easy to give to baby because it is only a drop for a dose.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic for all ages
customer_reviews.text: i found this probiotic after doing a lot of research when my 8 month old daughter was on 10 days of antibiotics. She went from having extremely loose bowels to struggling to go when she was off of them. We started her on Probonix and she was basically back to normal within 2 days. The dropper makes it very to dispense the drops right into her mouth. She definitely does not like the taste but it is the easiest and quickest option for us with the most effective results.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavna Middlebrook

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if there's any difference or major change to my child's health in the last month or so, but the drops are very easy to use, don't taste gross or bitter and blend very well in a cup of watered down apple juice.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: This product got moldy within a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This product got moldy within a few weeks. I followed instructions on proper care (cleaned out the dripper, never let it come in contact with anything that would accelerate bacteria growth, etc) but it still managed to get mold growth.
customer_reviews.author: Nevada

customer_reviews.title: I am a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the kids drops for my 1.5 year old for about 8 months. It is easy to get him to take them, and has made a huge improvement on his (now lack of) constipation. I will continue buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: How much is 6 or 8 drops?
customer_reviews.text: The drop measurements should be more precise, rather than number of drops give measurements in ml and have markings on the dropper.
customer_reviews.author: P Louis

customer_reviews.title: Son caught rash from liquid
customer_reviews.text: A little bit dripped on my sons chin and cheek as I was putting it in his mouth and he caught a very bad rash not sure what’s in the stuff but please don’t buy it save your money not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Claudine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! When my son is on antibiotics it just distroys his stomach. We give 8drops at lunch time and no more tummy issues with medicine .
customer_reviews.author: tessa n

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my baby she has has less gas pain and digestion issues in general since starting probonix!! Thank you so much.. also she is now 7 month old and hasn't been sick, knock on wood!! I truly believe this is why.. again thank you for making this great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jilaine C.

customer_reviews.title: Baby Loves The Taste
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter is 11 Months old and was having trouble pooping as she eats more solids. She's been taking this for a couple weeks and I believe it's really helping. She rarely skips a day and doesn't grunt or cry when she's pooping now. When I hold up the bottle and ask if she is ready she gets a big smile and sticks her tongue out.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany M.

customer_reviews.title: We give this to our son every night, no ...
customer_reviews.text: We give this to our son every night, no side effects. The wide spectrum of probiotics encouraged us to purchase this product, and we don't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: HJacobH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to give dropper.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to give baby. Baby doesn't seem to mind the flavor. Has a weird smell but probably normal.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Did it "go bad" or is this what fermented bacteria looks like?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it worked. But a few weeks after I bought it I tried it myself, and I realized it looked/smelled/tasted nasty, and I started to feel guilty about having given it to the baby.
customer_reviews.author: T Will

customer_reviews.title: Helped my baby
customer_reviews.text: At 2 weeks old my son became very colicky. As being a breastfed baby, I was constantly analyzing my diet to see if it was something I was eating that was causing him discomfort. At 4 weeks I decided to start him on this probiotic and within two weeks of starting the supplement, I had my happy baby back! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I didn't try anything else for my baby but it seems to work! The seller is no exception either. Smooth to work with and prompt delivery!
customer_reviews.author: DJDoDo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very effective.
customer_reviews.text: So easy, just 2-4 drops 2 times a day. And very effective. We used to use a powder probiotic for our tot, but he doesn't drink anything but water (his choice). It was hard to mix the powder probiotic with water, because it tastes just gross. This is a great option!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Miles

customer_reviews.title: EH.
customer_reviews.text: honestly with the stevia in there I don't consider this product organic. We had to switch to a refrigerated probiotic. This one did not help my sweet baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: This dropper is easy to use -- I just drop it into my 1-year old's mouth and then I don't have to worry about mixing it into his food like powdered probiotics. He likes the taste and has been a very healthy baby so I think it works well.
customer_reviews.author: adetgen

customer_reviews.title: We are still on our first bottle of probonics, ...
customer_reviews.text: We are still on our first bottle of probonics, however we have noticed a difference in our babies demeanor. He is much calmer and doesn’t struggle as much to go #2. This product does seem to have a different smell to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Baby makes funny face when i give it to her, then smiles, very cute. Just ordered 2nd bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Sulzer

customer_reviews.title: Happy gut is important at every age.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson who struggled with sleeping all night. He still does not sleep all night but his belly is happier and he is not screaming in pain. Hopefully he finds a rested mommy, is a happy mommy.
customer_reviews.author: Mom8385

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It’s helped to clear up my baby’s eczema. She makes a funny face when I give it to her so I don’t think it tastes that great, and it smells a little odd, but works well for what I wanted it for!
customer_reviews.author: alexis myers

customer_reviews.title: Good product, noticed decrease in my son's gassiness after ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, noticed decrease in my son's gassiness after using this product for about a month. I have been using it for about 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: but it doesn't taste bad; my 5 month old daughter takes her daily ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells awful, but it doesn't taste bad; my 5 month old daughter takes her daily dose with no complaints and it really seems to have helped with her gas and regularity. I'd give it 5/5 if it didn't smell so terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a very good product on paper but we wont ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a very good product on paper but we wont have a chance to find out because my 2 year old , who's very used to taking probiotics daily, really doesn't like the taste. Unfortunately a waste of $30 :(
customer_reviews.author: Inna

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work on my son!
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work well on my son. He has to take antibiotics everyday due to a medical condition so I’ve been giving him this also in hopes it will help his digestive system. I noticed on days that he doesn’t take this, he’s more gassy.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Ho

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend to anyone with babies who have some tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend to anyone with babies who have some tummy issues! Our doc recommended that we put our son on a daily probiotic and this was the highest rated one we could find. It's resolved all issues and he loves the flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Celia Murkowski

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to see if it would help with my daughters eczema. First few days I gave it to her, she started running a fever...maybe coincidence? She liked the drops and they lasted longer than expected. I didn't notice any real differences though, just OK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Children's Probonix-- it really does work!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked miracles for our preemie infant who had to be given a course of antibiotics at birth. It has greatly helped with the antibiotics side effects, his colic, acid reflux and eczema. I totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Stay-at-home Madre

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Administer to Infants
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works great! My infant takes it with no issues when squirted into her mouth near her cheek.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Roessler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is excellent & I think these are helping my baby! She’s medically complex and on antibiotics steadily right now and believe this is a great addition to her daily needs. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: one drop daily for our newborn and really helps with regularity and fussiness related to gas and pooping.
customer_reviews.author: Nattyp

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product was moldy when I was about to give it to my child. Please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped with my baby's gas pains. You have to be consistent though. And he likes the flavor as well. It's expensive but lasts a long long time. And if it alleviates his pain I'd pay double.
customer_reviews.author: care2direct

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I only used this product for a few days and I saw an improvement in my 4 week old's gas. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: janelle

customer_reviews.title: Helps with infant gas
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help with gas issues with my 2 month old. When I stop giving him a drop a day he seems to be more fussy and gassy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Better digestion
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and helps well to my kid's digestion system.
customer_reviews.author: servet

customer_reviews.title: Love this and recommend for other parents to use on their children.
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with allergy related issues in my little one, and also having multiple ear infections which required antibiotics to treat. Since my little one's stomach was not doing well post-antibiotics, I got this product after looking at other reviews. It's been working great with my kid! Also, as a bonus, my little one finally stopped having a runny nose. I'm not sure of it's entirely due to adding probiotics and liquid vitamin/minerals to my little one's daily regimen, but I'm very pleased with the positive results overall in my kid's health.
customer_reviews.author: MB48

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Before probionix my daughter struggled daily with her bowel movements with little to no results and often painful for her. After probionix there is no pain and little to no struggle.
customer_reviews.author: jorge soto

customer_reviews.title: ... effects on my baby and seems to be a good product
customer_reviews.text: No side effects on my baby and seems to be a good product
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all of my boys
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand of probiotics since my twins were about 5-6 months old (they're now 14mo), and my 4 year old has been on it for awhile now too. A healthy gut is extremely important, more so when the little ones are on antibiotics, so these drops are my go-to!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about these probiotics! My 4 day old baby unfortunately had to be on 48 hours of IV antibiotics, which took a toll on his gut. I discovered these probiotics and decided to give them a try to help restore his healthy bacteria and I'm SO glad I did. We are on day 5 of the probiotics and I've already noticed a huge difference in him. He is less fussy and has started regularly passing healthy gas and stools again. They're not cheap, but well worth it in my opinion. Because he's an infant, he only needs 1-2 drops a day. I plan on continuing to use these regularly to help boost his immune system!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It's ok..
customer_reviews.text: I would consider this your typical probiotic. No change or difference from other probiotics my daughter has tried in the past. Probably won't try it again.
customer_reviews.author: R.W

product_meta.title: Probonix Kids Probiotic for Toddlers and Children, Organic, Non-GMO Liquid Probiotic Drops, 8 Live Probiotic Strains to Support Gut Health for Toddlers and Children - 1 Month Supply, Grape
feature_bullets: FREE KIDS FROM TUMMY TROUBLE - Probonix will help your little one reach a healthy balance of bacteria in the gut, leading to a healthier immune system, better digestion, and lower chances of long-term GI health issues. Probonix could help your child with issues like: gas, colic, thrush, diarrhea, eczema, constipation, asthma, lactose intolerance, and more!

PROPRIETARY FORMULA INCREASES EFFECTIVENESS - For a probiotic to be effective, the live bacterial cultures must survive the harsh environment of your stomach to reach your intestinal tract. Probonix’s one-of-a-kind acid-coating process enables the live bacteria culture to pass safely through the destructive and acidic environment of your stomach and into your gut. Competing products may promise more probiotics per dose, but Probonix Restore will get more of them alive and to your gut.

8 LIVE PROBIOTIC STRAINS - Our liquid probiotic uses an exclusive formula of 8 of the most effective probiotic strains: lactobacillus rhamnosus, lactobacillus acidophilus,bifidobacterium bifidum, bifidobacterium breve, bifidobacterium infantis, bifidobacterium lactis, bifidobacterium longum, and lactobacillus reuteri.

TASTES GREAT AND EASY TO USE - No refrigeration required. The liquid format makes it easy to give to infants and small children. It can be placed directly on the tongue. Or if your child doesn’t want to take the drops directly, under 110 degrees Fahrenheit (temperatures of 110 and above will start to kill off the healthy probiotics in the mixture). The required dosage is small enough that your child won’t even notice it in their drink.

100% NATURAL INGREDIENTS - Probonix is an organic, non-GMO, and all natural supplement free from gluten, dairy, sugar, soy, eggs, fish/shellfish, and peanuts/tree nuts. There are no chemical additives or unnatural ingredients in Probonix.
